Title: Relates to the definition and term of real estate listing agreements
Summary: Relates to the definition and term of real estate listing agreements; provides that no real estate broker shall be a party to a listing agreement if such agreement is for a period longer than two years; provides that a listing agreement shall not be enforceable if the agreement is for a period longer than two years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to the definition and term of real estate listing agreements
